description:
Sora and the others arrange a welcome party for Tsubasa. He says he wants to eat a dish from Skyland called “yakitai” but they struggle to make it taste like the original.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mumumu! Omoide no Ryouritte Donna Aji!?
Yum! What`s the Taste of Home?
むむむ! 思い出の料理ってどんな味!?
